titleStmt.title: The declaration of Captain Hotham sent to the Parliament, wherein hee sheweth the reasons of his marching into the county of York, with some troops of horse and foot, as also why he consented not to the treaty of peace agreed upon by some of the gentlemen of that county. Imprimatur, H. Elsyng. Cler. Parl. Dom. Com.
titleStmt.author: Hotham, John, Sir, d. 1645 Jan. 2.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
